quote: Religion, n. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Religion. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Religion. It's given people hope in a world torn apart by religion.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: Beliefs are not related to religion but they are basically about who you are.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: Religion is for those who don't want to go to hell, and spirituality is for those who have already been there.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: Religion is a complex and often contradictory force in our world. It fosters hope and comfort but also doubt and guilt. It creates both community and exclusion. It brings societies together around shared belief and tears them apart through war. However, what unites the faithful, whatever their religion, is the unshakeable force of generosity.
author: Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen

quote: God has no religion.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Religion is the masterpiece of the art of animal training, for it trains people as to how they shall think.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: God save us from religion.
author: David Eddings

quote: I think religion is a neurological disorder.
author: Bill Maher

quote: A faith to live by, a self to live with, and a purpose to live for.
author: Bob Harrington

quote: Religion is more than rite and ritual.
author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi

quote: Love and respect all people. Hate and destroy all faith.
author: Penn Jillette,  God, No!: Signs You May Already Be an Atheist and Other Magical Tales

quote: Religion is like language or dress. We gravitate toward the practices with which we were raised. In the end, though, we are all proclaiming the same thing. That life has meaning. That we are grateful for the power that created us.
author: Dan Brown,  Angels & Demons

quote: With or without religion, you would have good people doing good things and evil people doing evil things. But for good people to do evil things, that takes religion.
author: Steven Weinberg

quote: Have faith in your beliefs
author: Michael Christos Zeis

quote: Religion is a culture of faith; science is a culture of doubt.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Science flies you to the moon. Religion flies you into buildings.
author: Victor J. Stenger

quote: Atheism, a religion dedicated to its own sense of smug superiority.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: religion, the most powerful of the elements which have entered into the formation of moral feeling, having almost always been governed either by the ambition of a hierarchy, seeking control over every department of human conduct, or by the spirit of Puritanism.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Believe in the wonderment of life, the magic of love, and the reality of death.
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: Religion is the everlasting dialogue between humanity and God. Art is its soliloquy.
author: Franz Werfel

quote: Believe what you believe and it will be, believe what others believe and they will consume you!
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: You can have Jesus in your spirit and have an outrageous mess in your soul, and if you don't know what that's called, it's called religion.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: For great men, religion is a way of making friends; small people make religion a fighting tool.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam,  Ignited Minds: Unleashing the Power Within India

quote: Religion, like science, is only noteworthy when it emphasizes a matter of what is true rather than whose belief is greater or lesser or which deity works for whom. Sincere religion and tested science are similar in that their assertions can be argued logically and objectively; otherwise, we get false cults and babble.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: The problem with religion, because it's been sheltered from criticism, is that it allows people to believe en masse what only idiots or lunatics could believe in isolation.
author: Sam Harris

quote: My true religion, my faith in God. He gives me love and compassion. I simply return them by loving and being compassionate towards others. Our own heart, our own mind, is the temple of God. The teachings of God is to love one another as he loves us. We love by respecting and being compassionate, whatever they decide to do with their life
author: Ann Marie Aguilar

quote: Religion's just a well-oiled profit-driven denial of the randomness of it all.
author: Wally Lamb

quote: Religious structure often dilutes the spiritual experience.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: What we do in every other area of our lives (other than religion), is, rather than respect somebody's beliefs, we evaluate their reasons.
author: Sam Harris

quote: Beware the religion that turns you against another one. It's unlikely that it's really religion at all.
author: Joan D. Chittister,  God Speaks in Many Tongues: Meditate with Joan Chittister

quote: There is only one religion - it is a way a man dies.
author: James Runcie,  The Colour Of Heaven

quote: Scientific People, unscientific mind; why are we dividing the world which could shine? Between religion and science, all what matters is human lives.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  A Very First Book Of Poems: Heartbreak

quote: It's our faith that activates the power of God.
author: Joel Osteen,  Your Best Life Now: 7 Steps to Living at Your Full Potential

quote: I think it [religion] is an art, the greatest one; an extension of the communion all the other arts attempt.
author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle

quote: Religion is excellent stuff for keeping common people quiet. Religion is what keeps the poor from murdering the rich.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte

quote: I prefer a world with many beliefs and religions.It stimulates my faith to keep growing day by day.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Science is observing truth in the light of head. Religion is observing truth in the light of heart. Humanity is using both the lights. And education is developing that humanity.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Religion is an insult to human dignity. Without it you would have good people doing good things and evil people doing evil things.But for good people to do evil things, that takes religion.
author: Steven Weinberg

quote: Religion is like a pair of shoes.....Find one that fits for you, but don't make me wear your shoes.
author: George Carlin

quote: Belief means not wanting to know what is true.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: From faith, hope, and love, the virtues of religion referring to God, there arises a double act which bears on the spiritual communion exercised between God and us; the hearing of the word and prayer.
author: William Ames

quote: Faith, n. Belief without evidence in what is told by one who speaks without knowledge, of things without parallel.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: I can't understand why people use religion to hurt each other when there's already so much pain in the world.
author: Stephen King,  Joyland

quote: Faith ― acceptance of which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove.
author: Dan Brown,  The Da Vinci Code

quote: The religionist is a living fossil, embedded in that rock called faith.
author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quote: Yoga is not a religion. It is a science, science of well-being, science of youthfulness, science of integrating body, mind and soul.
author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style

quote: It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
